feed.title: cpprefjp - C++日本語リファレンス

entry.title: equivalent -- error_category : 出力を修正
entry.summary:
diff --git a/reference/system_error/error_category/equivalent.md b/reference/system_error/error_category/equivalent.md
index 30fb7dd97..4019fab84 100644
--- a/reference/system_error/error_category/equivalent.md
+++ b/reference/system_error/error_category/equivalent.md
@@ -57,7 +57,7 @@ int main()
 ### 出力
 ```
 true
-false
+true
 true
 false
 ```

entry.title: error_condition -- 表の表示崩れを修正
entry.summary:
diff --git a/reference/system_error/error_condition.md b/reference/system_error/error_condition.md
index d0d6b650b..f247e8ac9 100644
--- a/reference/system_error/error_condition.md
+++ b/reference/system_error/error_condition.md
@@ -46,7 +46,6 @@ Visual C++ 2010、GCC 4.6.1では[`generic_category()`](generic_category.md)と[
 | `bool operator<=(const error_condition&, const error_condition&) noexcept;` | 左辺が右辺以下か判定する (`operator<=>`により使用可能) | C++20 |
 | `bool operator>(const error_condition&, const error_condition&) noexcept;` | 左辺が右辺より大きいか判定する (`operator<=>`により使用可能) | C++20 |
 | `bool operator>=(const error_condition&, const error_condition&) noexcept;` | 左辺が右辺以上か判定する (`operator<=>`により使用可能) | C++20 |
-
 | [`make_error_condition`](make_error_condition.md) | `errc`から`error_condition`オブジェクトを生成する | C++11 |

entry.title: end -- コード例の出力を修正
entry.summary:
diff --git a/reference/flat_map/flat_multimap/end.md b/reference/flat_map/flat_multimap/end.md
index b3df377d9..142823285 100644
--- a/reference/flat_map/flat_multimap/end.md
+++ b/reference/flat_map/flat_multimap/end.md
@@ -49,14 +49,12 @@ int main()
 
 ### 出力
 ```
-1 A
-2 B
-3 C
-4 D
-5 E
-6 F
-7 G
-8 H
+10 A
+10 a
+11 B
+11 b
+12 C
+12 c
 ```
 
 ## バージョン

entry.title: asin -- コード例の出力を修正

diff --git a/reference/valarray/valarray/asin.md b/reference/valarray/valarray/asin.md
index 8235a1e37..ab3264ad9 100644
--- a/reference/valarray/valarray/asin.md
+++ b/reference/valarray/valarray/asin.md
@@ -49,7 +49,7 @@ int main()
 
 ### 出力
 ```
-0.0998334
-0.198669
-0.29552
+0.100167
+0.201358
+0.304693
 ```

entry.title: tanh -- コード例を修正
entry.summary:
diff --git a/reference/complex/complex/tanh.md b/reference/complex/complex/tanh.md
index f3697a90c..4a147037b 100644
--- a/reference/complex/complex/tanh.md
+++ b/reference/complex/complex/tanh.md
@@ -56,11 +56,11 @@ int main()
 {
   std::complex<double> c(1.0, 2.0);
 
-  std::complex<double> result = std::atanh(c);
+  std::complex<double> result = std::tanh(c);
   std::cout << "tanh( " << c << " ) = " << result << std::endl;
 }
 ```
-* std::atanh[color ff0000]
+* std::tanh[color ff0000]
 
 ### 出力
 ```

entry.title: invocable -- 出力に合うようにコード例を修正
entry.summary:
diff --git a/reference/concepts/invocable.md b/reference/concepts/invocable.md
index 6a98cf9cd..a19bbae04 100644
--- a/reference/concepts/invocable.md
+++ b/reference/concepts/invocable.md
@@ -71,6 +71,8 @@ int main() {
   f<invocable, int>("invocable(int)");
   f<invocable, int***>("invocable(int***)");
 
+  std::cout << "\n";
+
   // 内部状態を保ち、等しさを保持しない呼び出し可能な型
   f<decltype(mut_lambda), int>("mut_lambda(int)");
   f<std::mt19937>("std::mt19937()");
